title: What is a “video game console? - Quora

response.answer_text: What does game console mean? The typical meaning of the term in modern usage is typically referring to a Video Game Console. System like the Playstation 4 and the Xbox One are examples of video game consoles.  (I’m a Playstation owner, so that’s the picture you’re getting. XBox is a fine system, just not my personal preference.) You will sometimes hear the word “console” used with regard to computing, where it is used to refer to a text input used to monitor the status of a system, often at a very low level compared to what the user would normally see…. but you won’t usually hear that in conjunction with the word “game”, so if someone mentions a “game console”, it’s a safe bet they’re referring to something like the above. EDIT NOTE: “Game Console” and “Console Game” are not the same thing. Word order matters. Do not merge this question with the similarly phrased “What does console game mean?” question, because they are not the same question.
